title: Morello Fulfil Your Promise
body: You were quoted as saying that if poppy is ever played in professional play you would nerf her, well she has been played at in multiple tournaments, so its time that you fulfilled your promise and nerf her till you guys finish her re-work.

replies.body: ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ Gut the {{champion:78}} and wipe away the debt ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ
She is getting a rework and will probably remain untouched until then UNLESS she completely blows up the competitive scene.
If Poppy gets nerfed before she gets reworked then i'm gonna unistall LoL and Riot can kiss my (sadly empty, i wonder why) wallet goodbye.

Poppy doesn't need to, and isn't going to be nerfed unless she reaches a 50% ban or pick rate.

Morello saying he was gonna nerf a champ if they were picked even once is a bit foolish imo.
